Description: Fetch the logs of a service or task

data.--details: Show extra details provided to logs
data.--no-resolve: Do not map IDs to Names in output
data.--no-task-ids: Do not include task IDs in output
data.--since string: Show logs since timestamp (e.g. 2013-01-02T13:23:37) or relative (e.g. 42m for 42 minutes)
data.--tail string: Number of lines to show from the end of the logs (default "all")
